dt: {bc}a method for approximating the area under a curve over a given interval that involves partitioning the interval by an odd number {it}n{/it} + 1 of equally spaced ordinates and adding the areas of the {it}n{/it}/2 figures formed by pairs of successive odd-numbered ordinates and the parabolas which they determine with their included even-numbered ordinates

shortdef: a method for approximating the area under a curve over a given interval that involves partitioning the interval by an odd number n + 1 of equally spaced ordinates and adding the areas of the n/2 figures formed by pairs of successive odd-numbered ordinates and the parabolas which they determine with their included even-numbered ordinates
